column5: BigChev - good to see that the phsyio therapy is paying off after your fall - those are some pretty good moves you have developed.  Merry Christmas.
Pretty cool site.  I tried it myself, but no luck saving it.  Did you crop your face shot from the original before uploading or did you just re-size it from the website ?    Thanks, Mike
I just cropped it on the website ,then when I went to e-mail it you can copy and paste the link from the URL...or whatever it's called...lol....
